QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, pfm_role_capacity.id odf_pk, portfolio_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, portfolio_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, portfolio_id.cap_unit_type as cap_unit_type, pfm_role_capacity.CAPACITY_CURVE as capacity, portfolio_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, pfm_role_capacity.ROLE_ID as role_id, pfm_role_capacity.PORTFOLIO_ID as portfolio_id, (SELECT UNIQUE_NAME FROM SRM_RESOURCES RES WHERE RES.ID = PFM_ROLE_CAPACITY.ROLE_ID) as role_id_dp, (NVL(CAPACITY_TARGET,0)) as target, (SELECT FULL_NAME FROM SRM_RESOURCES RES WHERE RES.ID = PFM_ROLE_CAPACITY.ROLE_ID) as role_name, odf_ca_pfm_role_capacity.partition_code as partition_code, pfm_role_capacity.PLAN_ID as plan_id, portfolio_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from pfm_role_capacity pfm_role_capacity JOIN odf_ca_pfm_role_capacity odf_ca_pfm_role_capacity ON odf_ca_pfm_role_capacity.id=pfm_role_capacity.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, pfm_portfolios.id odf_pk, odf_ca_pfm_portfolio.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_pfm_portfolio.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_pfm_portfolio.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, pfm_portfolios.CAPACITY_UNIT_TYPE as cap_unit_type, odf_ca_pfm_portfolio.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from pfm_portfolios pfm_portfolios JOIN odf_ca_pfm_portfolio odf_ca_pfm_portfolio ON odf_ca_pfm_portfolio.id=pfm_portfolios.id where 1 = 1 ) portfolio_id ON portfolio_id.odf_pk=pfm_role_capacity.PORTFOLIO_ID where 1 = 1
